abstract: Baseball Roundup; Miami Marlins defeat Washington Nationals, 8-0; other baseball scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tom Koehler outpitched Stephen Strasburg, Giancarlo Stanton homered, and the revitalized Miami Marlins earned their fourth win in a row.

headline.main: Marlins Beat Nationals for Fourth Straight Win, Bouncing Back From a 3-11 Start
headline.print_headline: Marlins Beat Nationals for Fourth Straight Victory After a 3-11 Start

snippet: Tom Koehler outpitched Stephen Strasburg, Giancarlo Stanton homered, and the revitalized Miami Marlins earned their fourth win in a row.
